comments.en:
This is essentially the same printer as the PhotoSmart 1100, except for the missing duplexer. It has ports on the side for inserting SmartMedia and CompactFlash digital "film" and has an LCD panel that lets you select pictures from the "film" to print.

Up/downloading of photos between the PC and the printer/memory card work with the HPOJ low level drivers. You need also the modifed USB printer.c kernel module from the HPOJ web site, if you want to access your memory cards via USB.

The best output one gets with HP's HPIJS 1.3 or newer. If you cannot update to HPIJS 1.3 for some reason, you can also use HPIJS 1.2.2 with the patches from Matthias Bunte and Richard Spencer-Smith ("hpijs-rss"). The GIMP-Print driver also works (Model setting: "pcl-900"), but only up to 600 dpi.
